name: Torrents.ru AD Remove v.1.6
description:
This style is updated  style 4227 by user 4989. I just added some code to remove several new ads. Enjoy adless torrents.ru! :)
And don't forget to disable this style from time to time and click on ads to support torrents.ru and all p2p community.
____________________________________________________________________________________

Please leave your opinion. I'd like to know what do you think about this style. 
____________________________________________________________________________________

v.1.1 - Removed new Carnage banner
v.1.2 - Removed banners from Nikita (01.06.08)
v.1.3 - Removed Perfect World banner (15.06.08)
v.1.4 - Removed Gladiators and Nikita banners (12.08.08), removed another Nikita banner (15.08.08)
v.1.5 - Removed TimeZero big left side banner (25.08.08)
v.1.6 - Removed another Nikita banners and banner of on-line game Острова (06.11.08)
____________________________________________________________________________________

Please, leave yor feedback here. I'm trying to check new ads every day. But if you see any ad on torrents.ru leave a massage here. I'll try to fix it as soon as posible.
